stories.text:
My co-founder and I met while working for a company in the geospatial space. I was a product manager there, and he was an Ui/Ux designer. We worked closely on a number of projects during that time. We don't have any special connection, but we both love the design side of things.

Looking at the design space, we discovered that there are some major issues that people face when trying to find designers for their projects -

A significant amount of time is wasted searching on Upwork and Fiverr for a qualified designer. Most agencies screw their clients, and they are also expensive. Billable hours for design services are not justified, causing budgets to skyrocket in most cases.

As a result, we are launching - Design Point

Consider it the Netflix of Ui/Ux design.

A monthly / yearly subscription fee will be charged.

What will you receive?

Design requests are unlimited. Unlimited feedback modifications. An infinite number of team members. Unlimited number of products and brands. project prototypes. Includes all file sources. Stop or cancel at any time.

How it will work ?

Subscribe to a plan that meets your needs and submit as many design requests as you want. Receive design updates within 1-3 business days depending on complexity. Unlimited feedback changes until you are 200% happy. There is no limits!

Pricing ?

7 days trial pack - $40 Monthly - $199 Yearly - $2100

To Get Started---

You can reach out to us - gupil@designpoint.io

Schedule a meeting with us - https://calendly.com/design-point/introduction
